titleStmt.title: The instruments of a king: or, A short discourse of the svvord. The scepter. The crowne. ...
titleStmt.author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.
Howell, James, 1594?-1666.

notesStmt.note: The words "The svvord. .. The crowne." are bracketed together on the title page.
Also issued as part of "Some of Mr. Howell's minor works" (Wing 3115) on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 715:8.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
